name: Ring Of Battle
description:
Ring of Battle is a multiplayer online battle royale shooter.

Ring of Battle provide a refined battle royale mode, polished features, and fine-tuned gameplay balance.

FEATURES:

► Multiplayer
► 3 Mod
► 5 Maps
► 20 Weapons
► 2 Grenades (FlashBang,Hegrenade)
► 7 Language (English, German, Russian, French, Swedish, Turkish, Arabic)
